titleStmt.title: Cyprianus anglicus, or, The history of the life and death of the Most Reverend and renowned prelate William, by divine providence Lord Archbishop of Canterbury ... containing also the ecclesiastical history of the three kingdoms of England, Scotland, and Ireland from his first rising till his death / by P. Heylyn ...
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

titleStmt.title: Cyprianus anglicus, or, The history of the life and death of the Most Reverend and renowned prelate William, by divine providence Lord Archbishop of Canterbury ... containing also the ecclesiastical history of the three kingdoms of England, Scotland, and Ireland from his first rising till his death / by P. Heylyn ...
titleStmt.author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.

notesStmt.note: A defense of Laud against Prynne's "Canterburies doome".
Parts 1 and 2 each have special t.p.; pt. 2 has imprint London : Printed by E. Cotes for A. Seile, 1668.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
